name: uikit
title: UIkit
description: UIkit is a lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces.

scripts.compile-less: mkdir css & npm run images & npm run compile-less-dists && node scripts/less
scripts.compile-less-dists: npm run compile-less-core && npm run compile-less-core-all && npm run compile-less-core-site && npm run compile-less-core-app && npm run compile-less-theme && npm run compile-less-theme-all && npm run compile-less-theme-site && npm run compile-less-theme-app
scripts.compile-less-watch: mkdir css & npm run compile-less-core-all && npm run compile-less-theme-all & node scripts/less
scripts.compile-rtl: mkdir css & npm run images && node scripts/rtl-before && npm run compile-less-dists && node scripts/less && node scripts/rtl-after
scripts.compile: npm run compile-less && npm run compile-js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-less && npm run watch-js
